content:
As an AI language model, I do not have access to real-time information. However, HURD has a number of security features that have been added to improve its overall security. 

One key security feature in HURD is its use of discrete security servers, which are responsible for handling authentication, access control, and other security-related tasks. These security servers use capability-based security, which means that processes can only access resources for which they have specific capabilities.

Another security feature in HURD is its use of a virtual file system, which isolates and limits the access that individual processes have to the file system. This can help prevent unauthorized access and limit the damage that can be caused in the event of a security breach.

In terms of overall security, it's difficult to compare HURD to other operating systems, as each system has its own unique strengths and weaknesses when it comes to security. However, HURD's modular and customizable design could potentially make it more secure than some other operating systems that use a monolithic kernel with tightly-coupled software components. That said, like any operating system, the security of a HURD system ultimately depends on how it is configured, managed, and used, and there may be additional security risks depending on the specific hardware and software being used.
